article_title: Navarre rate increase letter blames Obamacare (LETTER)

article_metadata.description:
NAVARRE — Earlier this month, residents in Navarre and Holley got a letter from Holley Navarre Water System that upset some of them.
In the letter, Executive Director Billy Sublett explained to water users should expect to see a rate increase "near the end of 2015."
"We didn't want to surprise anyone," Sublett Tuesday afternoon of the courtesy notice.
According to the letter, the increase was, in part, due to additional expenses caused by benefits "mandated by the Affordable Care Act
article_metadata.author: JENNIE McKEON 315-4434 | @JennieMnwfdn jmckeon@nwfdailynews.com
